verses.text: But \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* was \w building|strong="H1129"\w* his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, and he \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* all his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ He \w built|strong="H1129"\w* also the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*; the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof \add was\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* thereof \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, upon \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* of \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, with \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w beams|strong="H3773"\w* upon the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*.

And \add it was\add* \w covered|strong="H5603"\w* with \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* upon the \w beams|strong="H6763"\w*, that \add lay\add* on \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, \w fifteen|strong="H6240"\w* \add in\add* a \w row|strong="H2905"\w*.\f + \fr 7.3 \ft beams: Heb. ribs\f*

And \add there were\add* \w windows|strong="H8261"\w* \add in\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w*, and \w light|strong="H4237"\w* \add was\add* against \w light|strong="H4237"\w* \add in\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w ranks|strong="H6471"\w*.\f + \fr 7.4 \ft light was…: Heb. sight against sight\f*

And all the \w doors|strong="H6607"\w* and \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* \add were\add* \w square|strong="H7251"\w*, with the \w windows|strong="H8260"\w*: and \w light|strong="H4237"\w* \add was\add* \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w light|strong="H4237"\w* \add in\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w ranks|strong="H6471"\w*.\f + \fr 7.5 \ft doors…: or, spaces and pillars were square in prospect\f*

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*; the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof \add was\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: and the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* \add was\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them: and the \add other\add* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* and the thick \w beam|strong="H5646"\w* \add were\add* before them.\f + \fr 7.6 \ft before them: or, according to them\f*

¶ Then he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* for the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* where he might \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, \add even\add* the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: and \add it was\add* \w covered|strong="H5603"\w* with \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* from one side of the \w floor|strong="H7172"\w* to the \w other|strong="H7172"\w*.\f + \fr 7.7 \ft from…: Heb. from floor to floor\f*

¶ And his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* where he \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \add had\add* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w*, \add which\add* was of the like \w work|strong="H4639"\w*. \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* also an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, whom he had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \add to wife\add*, like unto this \w porch|strong="H0197"\w*.

All these \add were of\add* \w costly|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, according to the \w measures|strong="H4060"\w* of hewed \w stones|strong="H1496"\w*, \w sawed|strong="H1641"\w* with \w saws|strong="H4050"\w*, \w within|strong="H1004"\w* and \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, even from the \w foundation|strong="H4527"\w* unto the \w coping|strong="H2947"\w*, and \add so\add* on the \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* toward the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*.

And the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* \add was of\add* \w costly|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, even \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* of \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And \w above|strong="H4605"\w* \add were\add* \w costly|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, after the \w measures|strong="H4060"\w* of hewed \w stones|strong="H1496"\w*, and \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*.

And the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \add was\add* with \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* of hewed \w stones|strong="H1496"\w*, and a \w row|strong="H2905"\w* of \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w beams|strong="H3773"\w*, both for the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and \w fetched|strong="H3947"\w* \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* out of \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*.\f + \fr 7.13 \ft Hiram: also called, Huram\f*

He \add was\add* a \w widow’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, and his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \add was\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="H6876"\w*, a \w worker|strong="H2790"\w* in \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*: and he was \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*, and \w cunning|strong="H1847"\w* to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* all \w works|strong="H4399"\w* in \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*. And he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* all his \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.\f + \fr 7.14 \ft a widow’s…: Heb. the son of a widow woman\f*

For he \w cast|strong="H6696"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, of \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w high|strong="H6967"\w* \w apiece|strong="H5982"\w*: and a \w line|strong="H2339"\w* of \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* did \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* \w either|strong="H8145"\w* of them \w about|strong="H5437"\w*.\f + \fr 7.15 \ft cast: Heb. fashioned\f*

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w chapiters|strong="H3805"\w* \add of\add* \w molten|strong="H3332"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, to \w set|strong="H5414"\w* upon the \w tops|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*: the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w chapiter|strong="H3805"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w chapiter|strong="H3805"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*:

\add And\add* \w nets|strong="H7638"\w* of \w checker|strong="H7639"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, and \w wreaths|strong="H1434"\w* of \w chain|strong="H8333"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, for the \w chapiters|strong="H3805"\w* which \add were\add* upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*; \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* for the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w chapiter|strong="H3805"\w*, and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* for the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w chapiter|strong="H3805"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* upon the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w network|strong="H7639"\w*, to \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w chapiters|strong="H3805"\w* that \add were\add* upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w*, with \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w*: and so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* he for the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w chapiter|strong="H3805"\w*.

And the \w chapiters|strong="H3805"\w* that \add were\add* upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \add were\add* of \w lily|strong="H7799"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* in the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And the \w chapiters|strong="H3805"\w* upon the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \add had pomegranates\add* also \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* which \add was\add* \w by|strong="H5676"\w* the \w network|strong="H7639"\w*: and the \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* \add were\add* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* in \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* upon the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w chapiter|strong="H3805"\w*.

And he set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* in the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*: and he set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* thereof \w Jachin|strong="H3199"\w*: and he set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w left|strong="H8042"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* thereof \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*.\f + \fr 7.21 \ft Jachin: that is, He shall establish\f*\f + \fr 7.21 \ft Boaz: that is, In it is strength\f*

And upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \add was\add* \w lily|strong="H7799"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*: so was the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w finished|strong="H8552"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w molten|strong="H3332"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* from the one \w brim|strong="H8193"\w* to the \w other|strong="H8193"\w*: \add it was\add* \w round|strong="H5696"\w* all \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and his \w height|strong="H6967"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: and a \w line|strong="H6957"\w* of \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* did \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* it round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.\f + \fr 7.23 \ft from…: Heb. from his brim to his brim\f*

And under the \w brim|strong="H8193"\w* of it round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \add there were\add* \w knops|strong="H6497"\w* \w compassing|strong="H5437"\w* it, \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* in a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*, \w compassing|strong="H5362"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: the \w knops|strong="H6497"\w* \add were\add* \w cast|strong="H3333"\w* in \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w*, when it was \w cast|strong="H3332"\w*.

It \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* upon \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w looking|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w looking|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w looking|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w looking|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*: and the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \add was set\add* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* upon them, and all their hinder \w parts|strong="H0268"\w* \add were\add* \w inward|strong="H1004"\w*.

And it \add was\add* an hand \w breadth|strong="H2947"\w* \w thick|strong="H5672"\w*, and the \w brim|strong="H8193"\w* thereof was \w wrought|strong="H4639"\w* like the \w brim|strong="H8193"\w* of a \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*, with \w flowers|strong="H6525"\w* of \w lilies|strong="H7799"\w*: it \w contained|strong="H3557"\w* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w baths|strong="H1324"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w bases|strong="H4350"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*; \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w base|strong="H4350"\w*, and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* of it.

And the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w bases|strong="H4350"\w* \add was\add* on this \add manner:\add* they had \w borders|strong="H4526"\w*, and the \w borders|strong="H4526"\w* \add were\add* between the \w ledges|strong="H7948"\w*:

And on the \w borders|strong="H4526"\w* that \add were\add* between the \w ledges|strong="H7948"\w* \add were\add* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w*, \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*: and upon the \w ledges|strong="H7948"\w* \add there was\add* a \w base|strong="H3653"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*: and beneath the \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* and \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \add were\add* certain \w additions|strong="H3914"\w* made of \w thin|strong="H4174"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*.

And \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w base|strong="H4350"\w* had \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w*, and \w plates|strong="H5633"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*: and the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6471"\w* thereof had \w undersetters|strong="H3802"\w*: under the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* \add were\add* \w undersetters|strong="H3802"\w* \w molten|strong="H3332"\w*, at the \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w addition|strong="H3914"\w*.

And the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of it \w within|strong="H1004"\w* the \w chapiter|strong="H3805"\w* and \w above|strong="H4605"\w* \add was\add* a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*: but the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* thereof \add was\add* \w round|strong="H5696"\w* \add after\add* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w base|strong="H3653"\w*, a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and an \w half|strong="H2677"\w*: and also upon the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of it \add were\add* \w gravings|strong="H4734"\w* with their \w borders|strong="H4526"\w*, \w foursquare|strong="H7251"\w*, not \w round|strong="H5696"\w*.

And \w under|strong="H8478"\w* the \w borders|strong="H4526"\w* \add were\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w*; and the \w axletrees|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* \add were joined\add* to the \w base|strong="H4350"\w*: and the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* of \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w* \add was\add* a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*.\f + \fr 7.32 \ft joined…: Heb. in the base\f*

And the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* \add was\add* like the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of a \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w*: their \w axletrees|strong="H3027"\w*, and their \w naves|strong="H1354"\w*, and their \w felloes|strong="H2839"\w*, and their \w spokes|strong="H2840"\w*, \add were\add* all \w molten|strong="H3332"\w*.

And \add there were\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w undersetters|strong="H3802"\w* to the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6438"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w base|strong="H4350"\w*: \add and\add* the \w undersetters|strong="H3802"\w* \add were\add* of the very \w base|strong="H4350"\w* itself.

And in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w base|strong="H4350"\w* \add was there\add* a \w round|strong="H5696"\w* \w compass|strong="H5439"\w* of \w half|strong="H2677"\w* a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \w high|strong="H6967"\w*: and on the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w base|strong="H4350"\w* the \w ledges|strong="H3027"\w* thereof and the \w borders|strong="H4526"\w* thereof \add were\add* of the same.

For on the \w plates|strong="H3871"\w* of the \w ledges|strong="H3027"\w* thereof, and on the \w borders|strong="H4526"\w* thereof, he \w graved|strong="H6605"\w* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*, \w lions|strong="H0738"\w*, and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w*, according to the \w proportion|strong="H4626"\w* of every \w one|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w additions|strong="H3914"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.\f + \fr 7.36 \ft proportion: Heb. nakedness\f*

After this \add manner\add* he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w bases|strong="H4350"\w*: all of them had \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w casting|strong="H4165"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w measure|strong="H4060"\w*, \add and\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w size|strong="H7095"\w*.

¶ Then \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w lavers|strong="H3595"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* \w contained|strong="H3557"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w baths|strong="H1324"\w*: \add and\add* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* was \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: \add and\add* upon every \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w bases|strong="H4350"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w laver|strong="H3595"\w*.

And he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w bases|strong="H4350"\w* on the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* on the \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and he \w set|strong="H5414"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* on the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6924"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*.\f + \fr 7.39 \ft side: Heb. shoulder\f*

¶ And \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w lavers|strong="H3595"\w*, and the \w shovels|strong="H3257"\w*, and the \w basons|strong="H4219"\w*. So \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w made|strong="H3615"\w* an end of \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* all the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* that he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:\f + \fr 7.40 \ft And Hiram: Heb. And Hirom\f*

The \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, and the \add two\add* \w bowls|strong="H1543"\w* of the \w chapiters|strong="H3805"\w* that \add were\add* on the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*; and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w networks|strong="H7639"\w*, to \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w bowls|strong="H1543"\w* of the \w chapiters|strong="H3805"\w* which \add were\add* upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*;

And \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* for the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w networks|strong="H7639"\w*, \add even\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* of \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w network|strong="H7639"\w*, to \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w bowls|strong="H1543"\w* of the \w chapiters|strong="H3805"\w* that \add were\add* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*;\f + \fr 7.42 \ft upon…: Heb. upon the face of the pillars\f*
